employee_external_id.notes: Direct: Flip employee_external_id maps to ADP associateOID (employee id).

absence_type_external_id.notes: Direct: external absence type code maps to ADP leaveTypeCode.codeValue.

status.ground_truth_path: /events/hr/v1/worker.leave.absence.request (no status field in create payload; status managed by ADP workflow)
status.notes: Logical: Status exists in response schemas but not in create request. ADP manages status through internal workflow.

start_date.notes: Conversion: Flip date (YYYY-MM-DD) to ADP date-time (ISO 8601).

end_date.notes: Conversion: Flip date (YYYY-MM-DD) to ADP date-time for returnDateTime.

start_half_day.notes: Logical: Represent half-day by setting startDateTime time component (e.g., 12:00) if policy allows.

end_half_day.notes: Logical: Represent half-day by setting returnDateTime time component (e.g., 12:00) if policy allows.

amount.notes: Logical: Duration implied by startDateTimeâ†’returnDateTime; compute from dates if needed.

unit.notes: Logical: Unit derives from calculation rules; API expects concrete date-times rather than unit.

employee_note.notes: Unmappable: Description exists in response schemas but not in create request body.

processing_context: Mapping Flip AbsenceCreation to ADP Leave Absence Request (POST /events/hr/v1/worker.leave.absence.request). Status field exists in response schemas but not in create request - managed by ADP workflow.
